import axios from "axios" import React from "react" const Cards = () => { const [movies, setMovies] = React.useState([]) React.useEffect(() => { axios.get("/api/movies/popular") .then((info) => info.data) .then((res) => setMovies(res.results)) }, []) console.log(movies) return ( <> {movies.map((data, i) => { })}
